summary:
14 years experience in Casino, IGaming industry among others. With MSc in Economics specialized in sales, business development, project management, operational management, and customer service. Proven ability in handling different tasks and projects simultaneously to tight deadlines with a long track record of building successful and long-lasting customer and vendor relations.

Specialties: Business development, Leadership, Strategy, Sales, Customer Support and Account Management, Key customer management, International experience,

Native Polish, fluent in English, Dutch and Italian with a working knowledge of Spanish and basic Russian

certifications.name: How to Be More Strategic in Six Steps

courses.name: Project Management: Essential skills for Managing Projects

profile_positions.description:
• Achieving sales plan for the responsible regions
• Product presentation to the customers and advising on the selection of the games and their setup, etc.
• Development and nurturing of the customer relationships at different levels
• Have deep understanding of the customer markets, products needs and the trends
• Responsible for the development of sales initiatives and sales forecasts, goals and strategies
• Coordinates and gain cooperation of the different areas of the company to achieve sales goals
• Develops, negotiates and closes sales, and monitors the full process to ensure customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Area Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for achieving the sales plan of the assigned regions.
•	Builds relationships with CEOs, COOs, GMs, senior executives’ customers where the relationship is critical to the success of IGT and the customer
•	Sales point-of-contact responsible for the development of key partner relationship management; creates relationships that have a business purpose beyond generating revenue
•	Responsible for managing the commercial gaming relationship that furthers business development activity.
•	Responsible for sales negotiations
•	Understands the markets and the competitors. Strategize and identify opportunities where IGT can add value to existing customer’s
•	Responsible for the development of sales initiatives and sales forecasts, goals and strategies
•	Regularly assesses the trends and competitive positioning of IGT’s products in the market· 
•	Coordinates and gain cooperation of the different areas of the company to achieve sales goals
•	Develops and closes sales of IGT’s casino products with customers and monitors the full process to ensure customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Sales Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Developing a growth strategy focused both on financial gain and customer satisfaction
•	Conducting research to identify new markets and customer needs
•	Analyzing business aspects in various departments and seeking opportunities for growth
•	Monitor changes in business data, assess whether the business is ready to take on new growth and write & present reports on findings to the higher  level Management
•	Contacting new clients in new markets to expand the business and building business relationships with new customers
•       Coordinating market intelligence covering competitors’ products, pricing and services.
•	Responsible for overseeing the process from order to installation and after sales service to ensure service delivery is within desired levels. 
•	Advising clients on market trends, competitive behaviour and developments within the business.
•	Prepare and submit regular reports as required on client and sales activities, including but not limited to client performance, sales activities, actual performance to target, variance analysis and sales forecasts.
•	Represents the company at functions, meetings and trade events.
•	Fulfilling requirements for business deals and other business obligations
•	Networking with related businesses and fostering B2B relationships
•	Contributing to creative discussions and decision-making about the business' future
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Account Management: Italy
    • increased company's market share on the floor by winning the deals and achieving and exceeding country's revenue numbers
    •  review of performance, product road map presentations
    •  preparation of proposals and negotiations deals
    •  presentations of new products during trade fairs or via presentations
    •  evaluation of  potential investment opportunities
• Training new staff in the team on the polices, best practices and processes
• Improvement of operational, customer service and sales processes by reviewing and adjusting process flows and documentation
•  Management of customer orders, forecasting, pricing and contract structures, product initiatives and commercialization,
profile_positions.title: Sales Support Manager EMEA

company.name: TIP Trailer Services, part of HNA group

profile_positions.description:
• Management of internal communication plan for the project
• Management of team responsible for weekly newsletter and PR
• Responsible for preparation, scheduling, coordination and execution of internal commercial and product training 
• Commercial project management:
  • preparation of documentation, including SIPOC, workflows and project deliverables from testing to go live phase
  • Owning new commercial process and new product implementation
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Customer Video Testimonials– successfully completed 2 video testimonials – from the drafting to the ready files that were published on the website
• Responsible for Vendor relations, marketing materials and new product launches
• Event management: Managed 60000 euro budget for organisation and management of Customer Advisory Board annual meeting, including logistics, on-site promotional materials, venue selection and budget
• Managed new website project – from the negotiations with the company to the full and successful website go-live implementation; 
•  Branding: responsible for brand management of the new TIP brand introduction– consistency of GE brand and messaging across all of the regions; vendor and project management of TIP rebranding – leader on company’s rebranding
profile_positions.title: Marketing and Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Account Manager for Italy, France, Monaco and Spain- monitoring progress of customer orders throughout the entire supply chain  - from drafting the sales and lease agreements, product and settings advisory to confirmation of the delivery times; including liaising with finance department on any outstanding payments, credit notes
• Supervising of 2 Junior Sales Support, recruitment process via job agency, coaching and on the job training
•  Successfully managed all customer order process flows which included extensive contact with the logistics, demand planning, finance department and product management
• Project Manager for SAP ERP SD module; super user providing training and guidance on the SAP environment for Sales
•  Responsible for the selection, company branding, and budget of the promotional give-aways for product launches, events or customer relation events; including local printed sales collaterals, mailings and show news
•  Project manager of the trade show ICE and G2E– show news, product leaflets, product promotional branding at the stand, gifts, and media; including customer product presentations at the stand and during the show hours; managed annual budgets for POS, media and giveaways
•  Focused on continued improvement of Sales processes – managed to minimise level of errors in the more smooth and defined Sales’ product order flow
• Project Manager for product launch events at customer's location
profile_positions.title: Senior Sales and Marketing Support

profile_positions.description:
• Sales support to all EMEA Sales Managers – drafting sales and lease agreements, order handling; acting as a contact between logistics, finance, product, systems, technical departments and sales 
• Account management of France, Italy and Monaco– product advisory, order supervision, performance
•  Coordination and implementation of the various sales and product oriented projects
•  Preparation of regular reports to IGT’s Senior Management
• Responsible for the Showroom project – keeping showroom updated with the newest releases of the product; showroom product presentations to the customers and distributors
profile_positions.title: Sales Support

profile_positions.description:
• Project Management of Phare 2001 HRD at the regional level – preparation of documents, involvement in the international tender process, project implementation supervisory in the region; 
• Coordination of Regional Employment Activation Programs;
profile_positions.title: Junior Officer - European Projects
